Oh, WAIT a minute. I HAD to post again now that I remember THIS little tidb=
it. I'm sure you all won't mind, since I'm going to be gone anyway, right?
=

Tankor? Boy, aren't you that same guy who moded me a bit back by ignoring =
my shots despite me repeatedly asking you to acknowledge them? Kid, you've =
got a LOT to learn about RPGing, but if you can pull stunts like that and g=
et away with it completely free, bravo. Me and Cardhead fought, didn't alwa=
ys agree, but we at least agreed that you, Tankor, are a moder. And that is=
 all I've got to say.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Hollywood Na=
rrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 13, 2003 4:31 AM=

  Subject: My Sundown...


  After some consideration I've decided that I'=
m going to be leaving. It's obvious that many here hate me and I shouldn't =
be a member of this RPG. I simply cannot sit idly by while people take shot=
s at me, I always must respond. For this, I am an outcast, and not fit to p=
ost here, let alone hang around here. So, hopefully for the final time, I a=
m gone. Goodbye, and good luck.

  "Here I am beside myself... again."

  H=
N

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 

             
       
       

  Your us=
e of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
